main event: A bright light resembling a saucer-shaped craft was observed in Cupertino, California on September 29, 1955.
interesting points: The object had a very bright appearance and descended toward the earth., The observation lasted for approximately 4 minutes., Witnesses described the object as having a long elliptical tail with multiple colors., The object was said to be rectangular in shape and made no sound., The conclusion from the investigation identified the sighting as related to a missile launch that occurred shortly before the observation.
sighted object: a bright light resembling a saucer-shaped craft
witness description: The witness reported seeing a very bright light that was brighter and faster than anything previously observed.
